page.title: 04A LANGPORT BOY'S DAY
page.content: I am 10 years old and live in Brooklands, Langport. I attend Huish Episcopi C.P. School. On 10th June 1985 I got up at 7.30 and ate my breakfast;a bowl of Cornflakes, toast and a cup of tea. I got to school at 9.06. Today we learnt about square centimetres and we also drew the house we would like to live in. At 11.40 we had P.E. in the playground. We had a recorder practice at 12.10 (I am the only boy who plays). For lunch I had sandwiches ,apple, biscuits, and orange squash but some children had a school meal. At 1.25 we continued our work and went home at 3.40. I saw to my pets; a goldfish, a budgie and three male guinea pigs. As it rained I stayed in and watched T.V. until 9.48 when I went to bed.
